articles.description: Lydia Rutter suffers from anxiety and says she is exempt from wearing a face mask but was 'harassed' by easyJet crew on a flight into Manchester when she failed to produce a medical certificate.
articles.content:
This is the moment a woman who says she is medically exempt from wearing a mask was 'humiliated' over the speaker by an easyJet pilot.
Lydia Rutter was returning from Tenerife to Manchester when she… [+5870 chars]

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077's truly awful sex scenes undercut its great relationships - PC Gamer
articles.description: How Cyberpunk spoils the mood by overcommitting.
articles.content: Cyberpunk 2077 was always billed as being a mature game with 'adult' themes, which, let's be real, could mean anything in videogames. In execution, Cyberpunk does actually feel adult much of the time… [+6536 chars]
